forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers developing late. Lows overnight in the mid 60s.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of late night showers. Low 18C.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to occasional showers overnight. Low near 65F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to occasional showers overnight. Low 18C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 70F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 21C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 62F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 17C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 72F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 22C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 61F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 16C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 71F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 22C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 61F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 16C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
